posts.title: New Year’s Resolution Mugshot Signs
posts.content: Hold yourself accountable for your unrealistic lifestyle adjustments by posing for a picture holding these New Year’s resolution mugshot signs. Each sign features a blank space in addition to a statement like “trying again” and “who am I kidding” underneath.

posts.title: Strength Training Beginner’s Book
posts.content: Learn the building blocks of how to sculpt the body of your dreams by following the tips found in the Strength Training Beginner’s book. This top ranked fitness book instructs you on the do’s and don’ts of weightlifting so you can maximize workouts and get results faster.

posts.title: Cologne Wipes
posts.content: Ensure you’re always smelling fantastic by using these portable cologne wipes. These classy wipes are packaged inside compact napkin sized envelopes and come in one of five intoxicating scents – making them ideal for the modern gentleman on-the-go.

posts.title: Microwave Popcorn Popper
posts.content: Whip up some delicious stove-top-style popcorn right in your microwave using this nifty popcorn popper. It’s made from a sturdy heat-resistant silicone and requires absolutely no oil or butter to cook so that you can enjoy a delicious and healthy snack.

posts.title: Smartphone Thermographic Imager
posts.content: Transform your phone into a state-of-the-art thermography instrument using this smartphone thermographic imager. It offers 384 x 288 pixels for superb image quality so that you can easily and accurately take temperature measurements.

posts.title: Cupcake Corer
posts.content: Make your baked goods taste better than ever by  giving them a delicious filling using this cupcake corer. It features a large and soft non-slip grip, cores the cupcakes in one quick motion, and ejects the extra filling in one piece.

posts.title: Game Of Thrones Coloring Book
posts.content: Bring the fabled land of Westeros to life when you fill in this Game Of Thrones coloring book. Page after page of this book comes chock full of realistically drawn and detailed images depicting the land of dragons, white walkers, and gratuitous nudity.

posts.title: UV Light Bubble Gun
posts.content: Put on a stunning light show with the pull of a trigger using this UV light bubble gun. This fun battery powered accessory lets you simultaneously fire a stream of lights and bubbles that are illuminated as they float in the air.

posts.title: USB Disco Light
posts.content: Instantly create a party environment anywhere you go with this USB disco light. The light features a flexible cable you can adjust to any position and comes with multiple light settings so you can alternate between a party, an emergency, or a reading light.

posts.title: High Heel Protector
posts.content: Avoid a public humiliation while out at a social event by making sure a couple of high heel protectors are firmly attached at the base of your heels. It’s a simple plastic cover that slips right over the thin high heel in order to prevent it from accidentally breaking.

posts.title: Heart Straws
posts.content: Don’t even dream of sharing a milkshake with your sweetheart until you can sip on your romantic malt with some heart straws. Their heart shape is not only more appealing than regular straws, but they also make great accessories for romantically themed events.

posts.title: Grass Fed Beef Snack Sticks
posts.content: Snap into a healthy version of a Slim Jim by chomping down on one of these grass fed beef snack sticks. Made from only the freshest of natural ingredients, they’re gluten-free, paleo friendly and contain no antibiotics, hormones, or nitrates.
